apiConstructor.shortdesc: Initialize the map: set properties, add a tile grid, draw it.

apiParam.apiDesc: the map can be dragged or not.
a MapExtent or a Location and zoom (comma separated)

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Initialize the map: set properties, add a tile grid, draw it. Default extent covers the entire globe, (+/-85, +/-180).

apiOperation.shortdesc: Get map height.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Get map height.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Get a reference to the current map provider.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Get a reference to the current map provider.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Get a marker with the given id if one was created.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Get a marker with the given id if one was created.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Get map size.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Get map size.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Get map width.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Get map width.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Get a point (x, y) for a location (lat, lon) in the context of a given clip.

apiParam.apiDesc: clip context in which returned point should make sense.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Get a point (x, y) for a location (lat, lon) in the context of a given clip.

apiOperation.shortdesc: pans and zooms in on double clicked location

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: pans and zooms in on double clicked location

apiOperation.shortdesc: Dispatches MapEvent.EXTENT_CHANGED when the map is recentered.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Dispatches MapEvent.EXTENT_CHANGED when the map is recentered. The MapEvent includes the new extent.
TODO: dispatch this on resize? TODO: should we move Map to com.modestmaps.core so that this could be made internal instead of public?

apiOperation.shortdesc: Dispatches MapEvent.BEGIN_EXTENT_CHANGE when the map is about to be resized.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Dispatches MapEvent.BEGIN_EXTENT_CHANGE when the map is about to be resized. The MapEvent includes the current.

apiOperation.shortdesc: zoom in or out by sc, moving the given location to the requested target

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: zoom in or out by sc, moving the given location to the requested target

apiOperation.shortdesc: zoom in and put the given location in the center of the screen, or optionally at the given targetPoint

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: zoom in and put the given location in the center of the screen, or optionally at the given targetPoint

apiOperation.shortdesc: zoom out and put the given location in the center of the screen, or optionally at the given targetPoint

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: zoom out and put the given location in the center of the screen, or optionally at the given targetPoint

apiOperation.shortdesc: Pan down by 1/3 (or panFraction) of the map height.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Pan down by 1/3 (or panFraction) of the map height.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Pan left by 1/3 (or panFraction) of the map width.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Pan left by 1/3 (or panFraction) of the map width.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Pan left by 1/3 (or panFraction) of the map width.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Pan left by 1/3 (or panFraction) of the map width.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Pan up by 1/3 (or panFraction) of the map height.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Pan up by 1/3 (or panFraction) of the map height.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Get a location (lat, lon) for a point (x, y) in the context of a given clip.

apiParam.apiDesc: clip context in which passed point should make sense.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Get a location (lat, lon) for a point (x, y) in the context of a given clip.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Add a marker at the given location (lat, lon)

apiParam.apiDesc: a sprite (where sprite.name=id) that will always be in the right place

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Add a marker at the given location (lat, lon)

apiOperation.shortdesc: Remove a marker with the given id.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Remove a marker with the given id.

apiOperation.shortdesc: rotate by angle (radians), keeping the requested point in the same place

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: rotate by angle (radians), keeping the requested point in the same place

apiOperation.shortdesc: Based on a location and zoom level, determine appropriate initial tile coordinate and point using calculateMapCenter(), and inform the grid of tile coordinate and point by calling grid.resetTiles().

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Based on a location and zoom level, determine appropriate initial tile coordinate and point using calculateMapCenter(), and inform the grid of tile coordinate and point by calling grid.resetTiles().

apiOperation.shortdesc: put the given location in the middle of the map

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: put the given location in the middle of the map

apiOperation.shortdesc: Based on an array of locations, determine appropriate map bounds using calculateMapExtent(), and inform the grid of tile coordinate and point by calling grid.resetTiles().

apiParam.apiDesc: the minimum area to fit inside the map view

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Based on an array of locations, determine appropriate map bounds using calculateMapExtent(), and inform the grid of tile coordinate and point by calling grid.resetTiles(). Resulting map extent will ensure that all passed locations are visible.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Set a new map provider, repainting tiles and changing bounding box if necessary.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Set a new map provider, repainting tiles and changing bounding box if necessary.

apiOperation.shortdesc: rotate to angle (radians), keeping the requested point in the same place

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: rotate to angle (radians), keeping the requested point in the same place

apiOperation.shortdesc: Set new map size, dispatch MapEvent.RESIZED.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Set new map size, dispatch MapEvent.RESIZED. The MapEvent includes the newSize.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Based on a zoom level, determine appropriate initial tile coordinate and point using calculateMapCenter(), and inform the grid of tile coordinate and point by calling grid.resetTiles().

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Based on a zoom level, determine appropriate initial tile coordinate and point using calculateMapCenter(), and inform the grid of tile coordinate and point by calling grid.resetTiles().

apiOperation.shortdesc: zoom in or out by zoomDelta, keeping the requested point in the same place

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: zoom in or out by zoomDelta, keeping the requested point in the same place

apiOperation.shortdesc: Adds dir to grid.zoomLevel, and rounds up or down to the nearest whole number.

apiParam.apiDesc: the direction of zoom, generally 1 for zooming in, or -1 for zooming out

apiOperation.shortdesc: zoom in, keeping the requested point in the same place

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: zoom in, keeping the requested point in the same place

apiOperation.shortdesc: Zoom in by one zoom level (to 200%) immediately, rounding up to the nearest zoom level if we're currently between zooms.

apiParam.apiDesc: an optional event so that zoomIn can directly function as an event listener.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Zoom in by one zoom level (to 200%) immediately, rounding up to the nearest zoom level if we're currently between zooms.
Triggers MapEvent.START_ZOOMING and MapEvent.STOP_ZOOMING events.

apiOperation.shortdesc: zoom out, keeping the requested point in the same place

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: zoom out, keeping the requested point in the same place

apiOperation.shortdesc: Zoom out by one zoom level (to 50%) immediately, rounding down to the nearest zoom level if we're currently between zooms.

apiParam.apiDesc: an optional event so that zoomOut can directly function as an event listener.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Zoom out by one zoom level (to 50%) immediately, rounding down to the nearest zoom level if we're currently between zooms.
Triggers MapEvent.START_ZOOMING and MapEvent.STOP_ZOOMING events.

apiValue.shortdesc: Who do we get our Map urls from? How far can we pan?

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Who do we get our Map urls from? How far can we pan?

apiValue.shortdesc: fraction of width/height to pan panLeft, panRight, panUp, panDown

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: fraction of width/height to pan panLeft, panRight, panUp, panDown

apiOperation.shortdesc: Zooms in or out of mouse-wheeled location, rounded off to nearest whole zoom level when zooming ends.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Zooms in or out of mouse-wheeled location, rounded off to nearest whole zoom level when zooming ends.

apiOperation.shortdesc: zoom in or out by sc, moving the given location to the requested target (or map center, if omitted)

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: zoom in or out by sc, moving the given location to the requested target (or map center, if omitted)

apiOperation.shortdesc: call grid.donePanning() and grid.doneZooming(), used by tweenExtent, panAndZoomBy and zoomByAbout as a TweenLite onComplete function

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: call grid.donePanning() and grid.doneZooming(), used by tweenExtent, panAndZoomBy and zoomByAbout as a TweenLite onComplete function

apiOperation.shortdesc: Pan by px and py, in panDuration (used by panLeft, panRight, panUp and panDown)

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Pan by px and py, in panDuration (used by panLeft, panRight, panUp and panDown)

apiOperation.shortdesc: Put the given location in the middle of the map, animated in panDuration using panEase.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Put the given location in the middle of the map, animated in panDuration using panEase.
Use setCenter or setCenterZoom for big jumps, set forceAnimate to true if you really want to animate to a location that's currently off screen. But no promises!

apiOperation.shortdesc: default easing function for panUp, panDown, panLeft, panRight, etc.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: default easing function for panUp, panDown, panLeft, panRight, etc.

apiOperation.shortdesc: EXPERIMENTAL!

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: EXPERIMENTAL!

apiOperation.shortdesc: Animate to put the given location in the middle of the map.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Animate to put the given location in the middle of the map. Use setCenter or setCenterZoom for big jumps, or panTo for pre-defined animation.

apiOperation.shortdesc: zoom in or out by zoomDelta, keeping the requested point in the same place

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: zoom in or out by zoomDelta, keeping the requested point in the same place

apiValue.shortdesc: time to pan and zoom using, uh, panAndZoom

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: time to pan and zoom using, uh, panAndZoom

apiValue.shortdesc: time to pan using panLeft, panRight, panUp, panDown

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: time to pan using panLeft, panRight, panUp, panDown

apiValue.shortdesc: easing function used for panLeft, panRight, panUp, panDown

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: easing function used for panLeft, panRight, panUp, panDown

apiValue.shortdesc: time to zoom using zoomIn, zoomOut

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: time to zoom using zoomIn, zoomOut

apiValue.shortdesc: easing function used for zoomIn, zoomOut

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: easing function used for zoomIn, zoomOut
